commit.message:
Fix: Prevent loading plugins with incompatible engine versions and add ignoreEngines option (#571)

* Initial plan

* Fix: Add version check in pkgLoads to prevent loading incompatible plugins

Adds engine version compatibility check in pkgLoads function before loading
the main entry file. This ensures that plugins with incompatible karin
versions are not loaded, even when called through hot-reload or install APIs.

The check validates pkg.karin.engines.karin or pkg.engines.karin against
the current KARIN_VERSION and returns early if the version doesn't match,
preventing the main file execution and plugin registration.

Fixes issue where pkgHotReload bypassed version checks during plugin installation.

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* feat: Add ignoreEngines option to force load plugins with version mismatch

Added karin.ignoreEngines boolean field in package.json that allows plugins
to be force loaded even when engine version doesn't match. When enabled:
- Plugin continues to load despite version incompatibility
- Outputs warning log (instead of error) with details about version mismatch
- Only applies to karin.engines field, not package.engines

This allows plugin developers to explicitly opt-in to loading on incompatible
versions while still being warned about the incompatibility.

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* 玩不懂

* fix: Only force load plugins when ignoreEngines is true

Fixed issue where plugins with version mismatch were not being loaded even
when ignoreEngines was set to true. Now when ignoreEngines=true is explicitly
set, isCompatible is set to true to allow the main entry file to load.

Logic flow:
- No version requirement or version matches: loads normally
- Version mismatch + no ignoreEngines: blocked completely
- Version mismatch + ignoreEngines=true: force loads with warning

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* fix: 修正插件版本兼容判断与 ignoreEngines 下的加载行为

- 移除对 peerDependencies/dependencies/devDependencies 中 'node-karin' 的查找，仅使用 karin/engines 字段
- 简化版本范围处理（去掉 workspace:/link: 替换，改为 trim）
- 不再在发现不兼容但设置 ignoreEngines 时强制把 isCompatible 设为 true；改为引入 shouldLoad 标志：
  - 若不兼容且未设置 ignoreEngines，则终止加载（提前返回）
  - 若不兼容但设置 ignoreEngines，则保持 isCompatible = false，但仍允许加载插件并执行入口
- 调整入口文件执行条件：非 app 类型插件始终尝试执行入口（支持 ignoreEngines 强制加载场景）

* fix

---------

Co-authored-by: copilot-swe-agent[bot] <198982749+Copilot@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: 炫炫 <2066855608@qq.com>

verification.payload:
tree 452476aad30ad99de29eb51e7528af960eab9391
parent 69b895aa5982ec76e3345927b8962146cc6b8bda
author Copilot <198982749+Copilot@users.noreply.github.com> 1761907811 +0800
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1761907811 +0800

Fix: Prevent loading plugins with incompatible engine versions and add ignoreEngines option (#571)

* Initial plan

* Fix: Add version check in pkgLoads to prevent loading incompatible plugins

Adds engine version compatibility check in pkgLoads function before loading
the main entry file. This ensures that plugins with incompatible karin
versions are not loaded, even when called through hot-reload or install APIs.

The check validates pkg.karin.engines.karin or pkg.engines.karin against
the current KARIN_VERSION and returns early if the version doesn't match,
preventing the main file execution and plugin registration.

Fixes issue where pkgHotReload bypassed version checks during plugin installation.

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* feat: Add ignoreEngines option to force load plugins with version mismatch

Added karin.ignoreEngines boolean field in package.json that allows plugins
to be force loaded even when engine version doesn't match. When enabled:
- Plugin continues to load despite version incompatibility
- Outputs warning log (instead of error) with details about version mismatch
- Only applies to karin.engines field, not package.engines

This allows plugin developers to explicitly opt-in to loading on incompatible
versions while still being warned about the incompatibility.

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* 玩不懂

* fix: Only force load plugins when ignoreEngines is true

Fixed issue where plugins with version mismatch were not being loaded even
when ignoreEngines was set to true. Now when ignoreEngines=true is explicitly
set, isCompatible is set to true to allow the main entry file to load.

Logic flow:
- No version requirement or version matches: loads normally
- Version mismatch + no ignoreEngines: blocked completely
- Version mismatch + ignoreEngines=true: force loads with warning

Co-authored-by: sj817 <74231782+sj817@users.noreply.github.com>

* fix: 修正插件版本兼容判断与 ignoreEngines 下的加载行为

- 移除对 peerDependencies/dependencies/devDependencies 中 'node-karin' 的查找，仅使用 karin/engines 字段
- 简化版本范围处理（去掉 workspace:/link: 替换，改为 trim）
- 不再在发现不兼容但设置 ignoreEngines 时强制把 isCompatible 设为 true；改为引入 shouldLoad 标志：
  - 若不兼容且未设置 ignoreEngines，则终止加载（提前返回）
  - 若不兼容但设置 ignoreEngines，则保持 isCompatible = false，但仍允许加载插件并执行入口
- 调整入口文件执行条件：非 app 类型插件始终尝试执行入口（支持 ignoreEngines 强制加载场景）

commit.message:
fix(update): 增强版本比较功能，支持严格语义化版本模式 (#568)

* fix(update): 增强版本比较功能，支持严格语义化版本模式

- 新增 `CompareMode` 类型，支持 'xyz' 和 'semver' 两种版本比较模式
- 实现严格语义化版本解析和比较逻辑，遵循 SemVer 2.0.0 规范
- 重构 `checkPkgUpdate` 方法，支持根据模式进行版本比较
- 优化 `getPkgVersion` 方法，精确解析 npm list 输出的完整版本号
- 为 `logs` 和 `range` 方法添加对象参数重载，支持版本比较模式配置

* 1
